name: df-tus
body: |- wceq(ctus, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cust)), co(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cdm(cuni(cv(s0)))), cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cv(s0))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cutop, cv(s0))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ toUnifSp =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(UnifOn)↦({ <(Base ` ndx), dom(⋃ s0)>, <(UnifSet ` ndx), s0 > }[sSet]<(TopSet ` ndx),(unifTop ` s0)>))
comment: Define the function mapping a uniform structure to a uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Nov-2017.)
